choices: One of the good girls (Oh, good! They sure will help you, right? Right?!)
One of the bad girls (Uh, Oh!)
A family member of the Senshi/Other.
1.content:
Are you shrunk with one (or more) of the good girls?

Maybe with a bad girl?

Or

Maybe with an ally, a friend or a family member of the Senshi?
1.title: Let's begin, shall we?

11.content: Who are you shrunk with?
11.title: One of the good girls.

111.content: Do you want Usagi, Princess Serenity or Neo-Queen Serenity?
111.title: Usagi (Sailor Moon).

11111.content:
You slowly and groggily awaken on a surprisingly soft surface. It has the color of skin, because...well, it IS skin. You assume you must be atop somebody's hand...but wait...you must've shrunken to a tiny size somehow! And the person whose palm you now stand atop is none other than Sailor Moon herself, otherwise known as...

"Usagi..." you think to yourself.

"Aww, hi, little guy!" Usagi coos. "I found you in the street, out cold, and brought you to my place. I'm so glad I found myself a tiny..."
11111.title: Usagi's Tiny Man

111112.content: Okay, Usagi can only see you as three more thing aside from a firend.
111112.title: Other options

choices: Closes her mouth. She was just messing with you!
1111122.content:
You are left in complete shock at Usagi's words. She wants you as a tiny snack?! Not wanting your life to end as nourishment for a giantess, you turn and run for it. Unfortunately, a finger of Usagi's free hand pokes your tiny body in the front, stopping you in your tracks.

"Where are you going, my little morsel?" Usagi teases. "That's not the way you get to my stomach!"

Grabbing you by the shirt, the towering young woman raises you above her opening mouth. From your current vantage point, you can see her tongue glistening with saliva and her pearly white teeth ready to chew you apart...unless Usagi decides to swallow you whole.

Unable to ignore her gurgling tummy much longer, Usagi...
1111122.title: Snacktime for Usagi

1112.content: Nice or evil Princess Serenity?
1112.title: Princess Serenity.

1131.content: Before we start. Do you want the nice Sailor Venus or the nice Sailor V?
1131.title: Nice.

1132.content: Before we begin, do you want the evil Sailor Venus or the Evil Sailor V
1132.title: Evil.

114.content: Which version of Any do you want?
114.title: Amy (Sailor Mercury).

choices: You and Amy get to know each other
11411.content:
After a rough night's sleep, you groggily awaken in an unfamiliar place. This doesn't look anything like your room! And everything looks much bigger than it should be...for one, there's a giant, blue-haired girl looking down at you...

...wait...

GIANT?!

Oh snap! You've somehow been shrunken to an inch tall and are now in the presence of Amy, the true identity of Sailor Mercury!

"A tiny person..." reacts Amy. "I can't believe I'm looking at a tiny person! Are you OK?"

"Um..." is all you can really say back to the giantess before you. In truth, being shrunken would make you feel less than OK, but you wouldn't want to disappoint a girl much taller than you.

"Oh, you poor thing...don't worry. I'll keep you safe!"

With that, Amy scoops you up into her hand and heads to her bedroom, taking you with her of course.
11411.title: Amy it is!

choices: Go with Amy to get lunch.
Stay in Amy's room where it's safe.
114112.content:
Just then, a loud rumble assaults your eardrums. Blushing in embarrassment, Amy puts her free hand to her stomach.

"Sorry about that, little one," says Amy, "but I'm starving! Let's get something to eat."

You consider your options: you could go with Amy for a bite to eat...but you yourself might get eaten by mistake. Perhaps you could tell your giantess friend that you're not hungry, but Amy might feel disappointed at that choice.

So what'll it be?
114112.title: Amy's getting hungry...

choices: You go through her body (full tour, meaning you live).
1141121.content:
(Note: If you wish to publish again, please read the rules. They are NOT there just for decoration or for the hell of it. And do try to work on your English please.)

Amy and you go to get some food. She gets a bowl of grapes for herself, which she likes to eat by swallowing them whole one by one.

While trying to get a grape for yourself, you end up falling in the bowl.

It looked like Amy was talking to somebody, thus she was distracted. Because of that, she dosen't looks into the bowl as she goes to grab some grapes.

She ends up grabbing you instead of a grape. You see her mouth open and get quite a nice vision of her pearly white teeth, her soft looking, bumpy tongue, and the black hole at the back that is her throat.

Without warning, you are thrown into her mouth. You land in her tongue and, while you simply couldn't believe in your current predicament, you had to admit that it was quite a nice feeling, having her tongue rubbing all over you, getting every bit of flavor that your tiny body had to offer her.

After a few minutes of this, Amy tilts her head upwards, causing you to slide to the back of her tongue, and the entrance of her throat. With a soft *gulp*, she swallows you whole, like the grapes she so enjoys. She comments on how big that last grape she ate was, but thought that it was simply from a different, bigger batch.

Meanwhile, you go down her soft, slimy and bumpy esophagus. After a few seconds, yo bump into a flash made ring, her stomach sphincter. It opens, sensing a new piece of food. You pass it and free fall for a few seconds, landing with a small *splash* in her stomach.

On the outside, Amy looks for you around the table but, when she dosen't sees you, she begins to wonder where you could be.

Does she realizes where you are? Or are you in for a very... intimate tour of Amy's body?
1141121.title: Go with Amy to get lunch.

122.content: Okay. There are three forms of Nehelenia to choose from.
122.title: Queen Nehelenia!

123.content: Which one of this femme fatales do you want?
123.title: Black Lady/Mistress 9!!!

1233.content:
(You, Mistress 9, Black Lady)

Note: If something is between **, it means it's a thought.

It was late in the afternoon, almost night time. You were taking a stroll at the park. You enjoyed doing so, especially at this time. Sure, it was a bit risky. But, it also was much more calm and peaceful than during the day. You arrived at a crystalline lake that reflected perfectly the Sun that was setting and giving place to the gorgeous moon. You sat there, at the lake's shore, simply enjoying the view and calmness of the place. However, that peace was soon interrupted by some rustling in the bushes and trees. You didn't know if you should check what it was or get out of there. Arming yourself of courage, you grabbed a stick that was nearby and went to check what it was.

"Hello? Is someone there?"

You heard no response. Only more rustling.

"It's okay, come out. I'm not going to hurt you.", you said, dropping the stick at your feet.

"That's good to hear.", replied a female voice. It had a sultry tone to it. It was dark and mysterious. "However, even if you tried to hurt us, I doubt you would have done much with a simple stick. *giggles*."

"Touché. Wait, us?"

"Yes. Us.", answered a second voice that, while it sounded a bit younger and a bit more loud that the first one, it was just as dark and mysterious.

"I see. Say, I don't mean to sound rude. But, I would like to know who I'm talking to, if you don't mind."

"Very well. Since you asked so nicely, I think we'll reveal ourselves to you."

At that moment, the two women came out of the bushes. And, when you saw them, your face turned pale and, at the sametime,, blushed a little. You knew exactly who they were.

"Are you alright? You look a bit pale. *giggles*"

"Judging by your reaction, I believe you know who we are."

"O-of course I do. You two are the arch-enemies of the sailor scouts, Black Lady and Mistress 9!!!"

"That's correct. It seem our reputation precedes us."

"W-what are you doing here? In a place like this? I don't suppose you're here merely to take a walk, are you?"

"More or less. Actually, we were looking for the scouts. However, we decided to stop and look at the Sun setting. Then we noticed you sitting here and admiring the moon. I assume you like the moon?"

"Yes. Indeed, I do. But, to be honest, it's not just the moon. I don't know why but, I always preferred the dark and mysterious night, rather than day."

"Hmm? How so?"

"Well, the night is calm and peaceful. However, at the same time, it's mysterious and beautiful."

"But, aren't you afraid? The night can be quite dangerous, you know?"

"A little. And meeting you two it's the perfect example of that."

"*chuckles* True. After all, we ARE quite dangerous."

*The most dangerous ladies to be around would be more accurate*

"Still, I think that it being dangerous only makes it more exciting."

"Oh? I see. *giggles* That's quite an uncommon answer. Most prefer the day."

"Eh. It's their loss. Taste is taste and can't be discussed."

"*giggles*"

"Still, why do you ask this? You two are the most powerful members of the Death Busters, except for the Wiseman. What would people like you want with someone like me?"

"You'll see soon enough."

As soon as she said that, Black Lady disappeared and reappeared behind you and knocked you out. You began to fall but, before you could drop even an inch, Black Lady caught you in her arms.

"Well, Mistress 9. It seem we have a new pet for us."

"Indeed. I can't wait to try him out."

"Neither can I."

With that said, the two of them teleported back to their base.
1233.title: Both!!!

12332.content: Where do you wake up?
12332.title: The next morning.

choices: give him a tour of his new home?"
123321.content:
You began to awaken and felt that you were on something soft. You opened your eyes to see that everything was huge! Trying to recall what happened last night, you remember your meeting with Mistress 9 and Black Lady. So it wasn't a dream after all. Your head hurt, especially the back of your neck. Checking to see where you were, you saw that you were on a bed. It had dark purple colored sheets and the pillow, which was were you were on, was the same color. The rest of the bed was obsidian colored, with pillars that went high and were linked by a purple curtain. Looking around, you saw a purple stand besides the bed, a wardrobe that was obsidian colored, a mirror with black marc and, below the mirror, an obsidian colored little desk. Obviously, you were in a room and, given the decoration, you had a pretty good guess as to who it belonged. At that moment, you heard the door knob turn. You laid on the pillow again and pretended that you were still sleeping.

"Do you think he's awake?"

"I don't know. Still, I think you used a bit too much strength on that blow."

"Yeah. I guess we spent so many time fighting those damned Sailor Scouts that I forgot how frail normal humans can be."

"Well, we just need to remember that. After all, we don't want to break our new interesting pet, do we?"

*Pet?!*

"Of course not. Provided that he dosen't rebel against us."

"Oh, don't worry about that. I don't think he will. He knows who we are and what we may be capable of."

"True."

They approach the bed and take a look at you.

"Tee hee. How cute. He's pretending to be asleep."

*What? They know? Nah, they must be bluffing.*

"C'mon, little guy. Wakey wakey."

You remained still, still thinking that they were bluffing. Then, Mistress 9 crouched down until she was close enough to your ear to whisper.

"We know you're pretending. Come on. You don't want to make us mad, do you?", she whispered, rising again to her normal stature.

**gulp.* Damn*

You opened your eyes to see both of them, looking at you with eyes that had a glint on mischievousness, malice and a bit of tenderness.

"Good morning, sleepy head."

*Well, better start this right.*

You smiled at them and said:

"Good morning, mistresses."

"Oh? It seems our little pet is already learning his place."

"Yes, Black Lady-sama."

"That's good. It means you'll be treated well. Do you have any questions before we begin the day?"

"Well, judging by the current situation and by a little pain in the neck, I assume that Black Lady-sama knocked me out, then you brought me here and shrunk me. Now, I'm your pet."

"That's right. You're quite smart for a human."

"Thank you, Mistress 9-sama."

"You are welcome. Still, aren't you afraid of your current predicament? Most would freak out by now."

"No. Not really. As odd as this may be and sound, for some reason, I don't feel even the slightest fear around you, mistresses. Sure, you two are evil and as dangerous as one can be. However, I don't feel any fear whatsoever. *Besides, my mistresses are undeniable gorgeous, hot and sexy so, I can't complain.*.

Unknown to you, this base increased even more Black Lady's and Mistress 9's powers, Allowing them to read your thoughts."

"It's great to know that you think so highly of us."

Now you were blushing.

"W-whatever do you mean, Mistress 9 -sama?"

"Tee hee. You look so cute blushing like that. And this base gives us the power to read minds, among other powers."

"Ah!", you were about to say something but remained silent. Your blush did grew, however.

"What is it? Is there something you want to say?", asked Black Lady, leaning down a bit.

"*sigh* I was going to say that it wasn't fair. However, given with who I'm dealing here, I wonder why I'm surprised."

"*giggles* And you're right. It is strange that you don't feel fear around us. Hmmm, we'll have to find out more about the reason later. Still, as long you behave you'll be safe and well treated. Still, you seem to be accepting quite well the fact that you're nothing more than our pet now. Even more surprising, it's the fact that you're willing to be so. Okay, you like us. But that dosen't explains how you are so calm and willing."

"Well, you said it, I like you. I think of this as a new adventure. And I'm grateful that you decided to make me your pet instead of a slave. Besides, it's not like I have something or someone to return to."

"Eh? Don't you have friends or family?"

"I did, once, had a family. As for friends, nope. None. None alive, at least.", you said, lowering your head. Your eyes seeming a little sad.

"What happened?"

At that moment, Mistress 9 elbowed Black Lady on her ribs.

"Ouch!"

"Black Lady!"

"Oops. Sorry."

"It's okay. I'm sorry, Black Lady-sama, but I can't answer. It's not something I like to discuss."

"It's alright. You don't need to if you don't want to. Take the time you need and tell us when you're ready, okay?"

"I appreciate it, Black Lady-sama."

"Anyway, I think it's time to begin our day. Now, what should we do with our little pet, first?"

"Oh! I know! Why don't we...
123321.title: In a bed.

1233212.content:
"How would you like a tour of the base? After all, this will be you home for the rest of your life."

"I think I would like that, Black Lady-sama."

"Good."

She grabbed you and lifted you up until you were above her considerably large bust.

"In you go."

She released you and you fell right between her breasts. You looked up and saw that she was smiling.

"B-Black Lady-sama?!", you said, blushing brightly.

"The hee. What is it? You don't like it?", she asked, feigning being hurt.

"NO!!! That's not it at all! *What man in sane conscience wouldn't enjoy this* I just didn't expected this, Black Lady-sama. But, why?"

"*giggles* Well, for one, to mess with you and to see you blush like you are right now. Also, I think you deserve it for such a great start."

"Black Lady-sama... Thank you. I feel honored."

Now it was her turn to blush a bit.

"My, my. You do know how to treat a lady."

*That's thanks to oka-san (mother in japanese).*

"So your mother taught you? She did a great job."

"You're too kind, mistress. Oh my! I apologize, Mistress 9-sama."

"It's okay. Just don't do it too often."

"As you wish."

"Well then, shall we get going?"

"Yes, Mistress 9-sama."

And so, you left the room. They showed you around the entire base. They showed you where the other rooms were. Surely they belonged to Black Lady, Prince Diamond and his brother. The base looked mostly like a house mixed with a military base from another dimension. Eventually, the tour ended and they took you to another bedroom. This one was different, however. The walls were hot pink. The wardrobe was the same color but a bit darker and there was a night stand of the same color. The bed was the same as Mistress 9 only plum colored. The bed sheets and pillow were rose colored, like the bookshelves.

"I gotta say. You two have great taste for decoration."

"Why, thank you. Glad you liked it."

Black Lady plucked you from her breasts and put you on the table.

"Now that you know your home, it's time to lay down the rules."

"I shall obey any rules and commands my mistresses give to me."

"Good, good. Now, rule 1: You'll alway be with one or with the two of us. That way, you wont be in danger. Rule 2-"

"Um, Mistress 9-sama, may I interrupt?"

"What is it?"

"Well, what are we going to do when the two of you have to go on a mission at the same time?"

"Hmmm, that's a good question."

"We could take him with us."

"No way! If we took him he could be injured or kidnaped by the Sailor Scouts."

You were surprised, flattered and touched to know that Mistress 9 cared for you. She was evil after all.

"May I give a suggestion?"

"Sure."

"Well, I'm stronger than you think."

"What do you mean?"

"Remember when you asked about my family?"

"Yes? What about it?"

"My family was the leader of a very powerful clan."

"What?!"

"If you made me grow a little, I could show you my clan's mark."

"Alright then."

Mistress 9 nodded to Black Lady. Black Lady raised her hand and it glowed a little. You felt yourself getting bigger. You looked at yourself and you were surprised to see you were normal sized.

"My, my. Now that I take a good look at you, you're quite handsome."

"I think so too."

"T-thank you, Mistress 9-sama, Black Lady-sama."

"What is that rosary on your neck?"

"It's a seal. It limits my power and also locks away my negative emotions."

"You mean like anger, sorrow and so on?"

"Yes"

"Why do you have a seal?"

"Because when I was born, the amount of power I possessed was so much that, if it wasn't contained, my body would have been destroyed"

"*gasp!* For the body to be destroyed the power must be immense. Even for a baby."

"Yes. Also, this isn't my true form."

"Hmm. Interesting. Can you show your true form to us?"

"Yes. Please stand back a bit."

They did so. You then closed your eyes and focused. A red aura emanated from you. They could see every detail of your transformation. Your skin paled, you gained more bulk on your entire body, your hair grew until it reached the end of your back and it was silver colored. Many red colored rune like symbols appeared on your arms and torso. Your canines became fangs and three pairs of red colored claw like marks appeared on your face. The red aura diminished until it was a thin veil of energy surrounding you. Black Lady and Mistress 9 were very impressed, to say the least. The energy was so high that some of the base's ground cracked a bit. They could feel the power emanating from you. And couldn't help but stare at you with lust. You opened your eyes and impressed them even more. You're eyes were now blood red with a black slithed pupil.

"My, oh my. And we thought you were handsome before."

You blushed at that comment.

"You haven't seen anything yet. If you like it now, wait until we meet an enemy. Then I'll show you what I can do."

"You know, if you prove that besides being a good pet, you're useful on field, when you are outside of the base, you'll be able to keep being this size."

"Thank you, Mistress 9-sama. I shall not disappoint you"

"And maybe here too for some "fun"."

You blush grew. However, instead of just blushing, you looked at them with a mischievous and lustful look and a mischievous grin.

"Mraow."

"Ara, ara. It seems our pet is a little of a flirt as well."

"I have the best teachers."

"Thank you."

"Thank you."

"If my mistresses are happy, then I'm happy."

"Hmm, hmm. Now, about the mark..."

"Oh. Pardon me. However, my mark is not the only thing you'll see."

You lifted your shirt and showed you back to them. They were impressed to see a red circle with black outer border that contained six big marks, three white colored and three black colored and several smaller ones that were incomprehensible to them. Also, inside of the circle, there was a full blue moon. And inside of said moon, was a silver colored shield with a yin-yang circle represented by two dragons, one white and one black, on it's center. However they were also very surprised by the amount of scars on your back.

"How did you got those-"

"Scars? They are part of my past."

"Ah, I see."

"Now that I think about it. We never even got your name."

"My name is Leon Miyanoshita Seiryu. But, if you wish, you can call me Leon. The Miyanoshita and the Seiryu were once mighty clans that possessed the most powerful warriors and exorcists. We used to purge the towns of evil spirits."

"Hmmm. Interesting. But, what about us? We are evil."

"Yes. But I choose not to turn back on you. Besides, I'm not tied by what my ancestors did. I forge my own path."

The two of them smiled when you said that.

"Now, back to my suggestion, my clan's village has a safe that could only be opened by one of the members of the main house, which was my family. In the safe, there are a few things that will help us not only to protect me, but to destroy the Sailor Scouts once and for all."

"What?! Something that can defeat-"

"Not defeat. Destroy.", you said, with an evil smile.

"Hmm. I see. You're quite evil now, aren't you?"

"Yes. Like I said, I forge my own path. And make my own choices. And I choose to follow you", you went to them, kneeled, picked one hand of each and kissed them. "my mistresses."

They were glad to see that you were so loyal to them.

"Still, you have an interesting history. When you're ready, we would like to know more."

"I think I know a way to tell you without words."

"How?"

"This base increase your powers and gives you many others, right?"

"Yes."

"I could show my memories to you."

"Really?! You trust us enough to look at your memories?!"

"If I can't trust my mistresses, who can I trust? Also, I don't wish to keep any secrets from you."

"Alright then. But, do we see your memories first or go to your clan's villages remains?"

"We'll...
1233212.title: A tour of the base.

12332121.content:
(Prince Demande (I finally got his name right))

"Very well, then. We'll have to go to the central room. There we'll be able to see your memories clearly."

"Alright, Mistress 9-sama."

You returned to your usual form.

"Why did you returned to being human?"

"Because I want to conserve my energy for when I need to. I don't use my other form, except for battles. I usually train every morning, so as to not get rusty and stay in shape."

"I see."

You left Black Lady's room and went towards the central room. On the way, you met with Prince Demande.

"Mistress 9, Black Lady, what was that immense- Who is this? What is a human doing in our base?! You know that-"

"HEY!!! Watch your tone of voice when you're talking to Black Lady-sama and to Mistress 9-sama!"

Demande stopped not because of what you said. But because of how you said it.

"How dare you! A mere and lowly human-"

He didn't got the chance to finish that sentence.

"Do NOT refer to him like that!"

Now that surprised both, him and you.

"Why do you protect this-"

"This what?! This WHAT?!", screamed Black Lady, shoving Demande against the wall so strongly that the wall cracked a little. "For starters, he's our precious pet, that's why he's here! Second, he is no mere human! And third! If you EVER so much as TRY to harm him, be sure that we'll make you regret it for the rest of your miserable and VERY short life! Understood?!"

You couldn't be more touched. For THE Black Lady and THE Mistress 9 to defend you like that. For some reason, they really care for you.

"Yes. But even if he's you pet, The Wisemen-"

"We already talked with the Wiseman. He approved. And besides, Leon here has showed that he's very loyal."

"Yeah? How so?"

"We are going to see his memories. He allowed to look into his mind willingly."

"What?!"

"Also, after seeing his memories, we are going to the place he was born to get something that can finally free us from the Sailor Scouts once and for all."

"Ha! I see he fooled you. How could a mere human posses something that powerful?"

"Well, for one. It's not ONE thing. It's many things."

"Oh?"

"Also, he's no mere human. That immense power you felt was coming from Leon."

"Ha! I'll only believe that after seeing it!"

"Very well. Leon, why don't you show him how you truly look like?"

"It will be my pleasure, Mistress 9-sama."

You transformed to your other form, and Demande was more than surprised. He couldn't believe what he was seeing and feeling.

"Who-? What are you?"

"My name is Leon Miyanoshita Seiryu. And that is all you need to know. Now, mistresses, I believe we should get going. We wasted too much time already."

"Yes."

"Indeed."

"I'm going with you."

"No.you're not."

"And why not?"

"For one, I only allowed Mistress 9-sama and Black Lady-sama to see my memories because I trust them. You? I don't trust you at all. Also, I'm positive that you are useless for the Death Busters."

"WHAT?! ME?! USELESS?! How dare you!"

"Oh? Then, if you're not useless", you said with a very serious voice that sent chills down his spine and that surprised Mistress 9 and Black Lady. After all, this wasn't the you they saw until now. "tell me.", you began walking in circles around him, like you were in an interrogatory. "What have you accomplished so far? Hm? What have you done to help the Death Busters reach their goal?"

Demande remained quiet, so you continued.

"What's wrong? Can't think of an answer? That's because you know I'm right. Up until now, you have done nothing! You contributed with nothing! Rather, you only made it harder. You and your obsession for Neo Queen Serenity."

"Y-you know about it?!"

"Oh, PLEASE!!! EVERYONE knows about it!!! And we all know what came out of it, don't we? Thanks to you, the Death Busters suffered an unnecessary defeat. One that could have been easily avoided! Hell, I don't even know why the Wiseman keeps you. You are nothing but useless."

He just stood there, shocked by everything that had happened on the last few minutes. First, an immense surge of power, then Mistress 9 and Black Lady say that it's their HUMAN pet that has all that power, then Black Lady and Mistress 9 defend the human, then the human confronts him with absurd statements. What's worse, deep inside, he knew they were true.

"Now, out of the way, my mistresses and I have more important things to do."

You passed right by him and he just stood still, like a statue.

"Now, shall we go, mistresses?", you said with a calm and soft voice and a smile.

"You really are full of surprises, aren't you?"

"*chuckle* You have no idea, Mistress 9-sama.", you said with a confident grin.

"Well then, let's go. We still have to see your memories."

"Yes, Black Lady-sama."
12332121.title: Leon's Past:The Miyanoshita Clan's Story - Prelude

123321211.content:
You returned to your normal form and the three of you continued your way to the central room.

"Leon?"

"Yes, Mistress 9-sama?"

"We just wanted to thank you."

"Eh?"

"Well... Not only you trusted us from the beginning, you also stood up for us against Demande. You knew how powerful he was and you confronted him all the some for our sake. Thank you, Leon."

"There's no need to thank me. I couldn't let that trash talk to you like that. Rather, I should be the one thanking you. After all, you defended me from him. I...", you said, hiding your face.

"You what, Leon?"

"I... I felt really touched when you defended me, and also when you worried about me before.", you said to them, feeling some tears running down your face.

"Leon, are you crying?", Black Lady, already knowing the answer.

"N-no. I'm not.", you said, trying to sound tough.

"Ah, ah, Leon. No lying."

"W-what are you talking about, Mistress 9-sama?"

"Leon. We know you're crying. It's alright. We just want to know why."

"S-sorry. It's just that, it's been so long that someone cared for me that... I...", you said, no longer containing your tears.

Suddenly, you felt two pairs of hands touching you. One on each of your shoulders.

"Hey, you are out precious pet. What kind of masters would we be if we let our pet be mistreated like that?"

"Besides, even tough we kidnapped and shrunk you, you showed loyalty to us from the very first moment. No one did that with us before. Heck, the Wisemen could get rid of us any moment if he wanted to do so. But you... You would never turn your back on us or harm us, right?"

"Of course not. Never.", you answered, grabbing their arms.

They let you go, smiling while you dried your tears.

"W-well. Let's go. We need to see my memories."

In a couple of minutes, you arrived at the central room.

"Now, go to the center of the room. I'll stay here and Mistress 9 will go to the opposite side of the room. We will create a magical circle. Once the circle it's complete, we'll go to the center with you and grab your hands. Then we'll be transported inside your mind. Once there, you'll be our guide, alright?"

"Yes, Black Lady-sama."

You did as instructed and Mistress 9 went to the other side of the room. Then they extended their arms. Two auras began to form. One plum colored and one rose colored. They surrounded their respective owners and began expanding in the form a a thin trail of energy until they touched each other. When they touched, they began merging until they became one lavender colored trail. Once all of the circle and auras became lavender colored, Black Lady and Mistress 9 went to were you were.

"Are you ready ,Leon?"

"Yes. I won't back out now."

"Then let's go."

They grabbed each one of your hands and you were transported to your mind.
123321211.title: Leon's Past - Prelude II

1233212111.content:
(Dark Dream)

The three of you were in a kind of void. It was pitch black and you could only see each other.

"Okay, we're here. Now what?"

"Well, we are in my mind. so whatever i think happens."

"That's right."

"Well then, let's try this."

You focused and everything began to shake. Suddenly, a corridor appeared. It had many doors and was illuminated with torches.

"What did you do?"

"I divided my thoughts in categories. This should make it easier."

You began walking and passes by many different doors. Each had a different name. Strategies, theories, etc... On the way to your memories, you passes a giant door that had many chains on it and a lock that had the shape of your rosary and ancient words, like your clan mark.

"Leon, this door..."

"This is where most of my power is sealed in. However, it's not the only seal."

"You mean that there's more that one seal?! One seal already locks away a great amount of power. How many seals do you have?"

"Six in total."

"SIX?!", exclaimed the both of them

You nodded. You resumed your walk. Eventually, you reached a door that had "Memories" engraved on it. You opened it and the three of you went inside. Inside, there were many other doors that divided you memories in happy, sad and so on. You walked past them until you reached one that was pure black.

"Here we are."

"Then, let's go."

You opened the door and everything became dark for a few seconds. Then, the surroundings began to change, in order to show the memories of that day. Suddenly, you were on a field of grass with many flowers. Behind you, there was a forest. And, in front of you, was the village of your clan. The houses were typical village houses. There was a tree surrounded by five fountains in the middle of the village. The tree had the same symbol that you had on your back engraved on it. Many of the houses had their own little gardens. And, right at the end, was your family's house. While it was bigger than the other houses and, of course, it was more decorated, it was of the same materials. Also, the spaces and alleys between the houses were adorned with party decoration, such as balloons, piñatas, etc...

"This place is beautiful! So lively and, at the same time, peaceful."

"Indeed."

You remained silent. For you knew that it wasn't going to be like this for long. The three of you went inside the village. Mistress 9 and Black Lady were really liking this. They didn't knew, however, if it was because they were seeing you memories or the fact that you trusted them enough to let them see said memories. Then, the people from your memory began to walk towards your family's house and you followed. When you arrived, you saw that, right there, in front of the house, were your family and you. And, even if it was just a memory, seeing them like this made you smile a bit.

"They are your family, right? And, is that a dragon?!", asked Black Lady, surprised to see a two winged dragon with white colored scales and claws and blue colored eyes.

"Yes. You see, my family could always talk with spirits. And we always had a particular affinity with dragons. And you're right. Those are Satsuki Oka-san, Rihito Oto-san, Momoko One-chan and Yuki One-chan. The only one missing is Saito Oni-san."

"Why is that?"

"You'll see.", you said with a neutral voice.

"That's you, right? The child in your mother's arms."

"Yes. What we are seeing happened on my fifth birthday. Tomorrow, it will make 13 years."

"You mean that... Tomorrow is your birthday?"

You nodded. They remained silent and felt very sorry for you. For they knew what this meant. Usually, birthdays are happy days. And to loose someone dear is always terrible. But to loose not one or two, but all of your beloved ones on the same day, with that day being your birthday... There wasn't a word that could express how horrible that was. All of a sudden, a scream was heard. You turned to the source of the voice and saw a woman running towards your parents.

"My lord! My lady!"

"What is it, miss? What's the reason for this scandal?"

She didn't had enough time to tell him. For, when she was about to tell, a demon appeared on the roof of a house.

"That would be me."

"You are...!"

"That's right, Rihito-kun. It's me, Dark Dream. Ah! That boy in Satsuki's arms is the newest member of the royal family, is he not?"

Your father remained silent and your mother held you tightly That alone, gave Dark Dream his answer.

"Not willing to talk, eh? Oh well. I didn't came here to talk anyway. I came here to destroy the Miyanoshita-Seiryu clans once and for all!"

"Not on our watch!!!", screamed your mother.

She handed you to Blue Eyes. Went to your father's side and they both drew their swords. They began fighting against Dark Dream. Also, everyone in the village was fighting with countless demons. It seemed that the fight was in favor of your clan but, soon enough, the tables turned. One scream was heard next to the other. And soon everything was a symphony of creams. Mistress 9, Black Lady were watching every detail. You, on the other hand, had closed your eyes and covered your ears. For you didn't wanted to revive that memory more than it was needed. You already revived it everyday. Then, everything became a field of flames.

"Eh? What's happening?"

"What- Who is that?", Asked Mistress 9, pointing to the silhouette that was approaching your family.

"That's Saito Oni-san."

"What?"

"But that means...!"

"That's right. Saito Oni-san betrayed us and joined Dark Dream."

Suddenly, the image began to weaver and, you were back in the Death Busters base.

"What happened? Why did we left?"

"I got us out of there."

"Why?"

"Because I didn't wanted so see that anymore. As for what happened, my brother aided Dark Dream in killing my family. Then, all of those who were still alive were tortured and brutally killed. Also, the women were..."

"What happened to the women?"

"They were... Rapped."

"Eh?!"

"R-rapped?!"

"Yes. Every single women, both adult and children were rapped. Dark Dream himself rapped my mother and my bother rapped my sisters. Father and I were forced to watch. Then, after the rapping, they killed them and Dark Dream killed my father. As for me, they let me live. Dark Dream said that I would be a fun toy to play with in the future."

The two of them were both, shocked and horrorised at what you had to go through.

"What about Blue Eyes?"

"I couldn't risk her safety or the safety of the other creatures so, after Dark Dream, my brother and the other surviving demons left, I went to the safe in my house and put them in there, along with my clan's other two most precious things. I have lived alone ever since then. Thinking only about revenge.", you said, on the verge of tears and clenching your fist tightly.

"Against Dark Dream and your brother, right?"

"Not against my brother. I want to find out why he did it. As for Dark Dream..."

Your fist began to glow with a light blue aura. You then created an ice statue of Dark Dream. Needless to say that that surprised Black Lady and Mistress 9.

"What I want is to ERASE HIM FROM EXISTENCE!!!", you said with rage in you voice. Tears flowing freely down your face.

Mistress 9 and Black Lady could feel all too well the sadness and the hatred your voice carried. Your scream echoed through all of the base. You then pointed your palm towards the statue and, with a quick blast of energy, you smashed it in pieces. Suddenly, you felt yourself being enveloped by two pairs of arms in a compassionate and comforting hug.

"Leon, you're not alone."

"Eh?"

"She's right. You have us. You are ours, Leon. We won't forgive anyone who harms you in anyway."

"Mistresses..."

"Know that you can count on us, alright? Always."

You then fell to your knees and gladly returned the hug, only you hugged them tightly. Like a child would hug a mother or and aunt.

"Thank you, mistresses. Thank you. You don't know how much that means to me."

The three of you just remained there for a while. And, honestly, you didn't wanted it to end. But, as they say, all good things must come to an end.

"Well then.", said Mistress 9, getting up. "It's been a long and interesting day. I say we relax and go to sleep. In the morning, we'll go to your village and get the tools for the the Sailor Scout's destruction."

"Agreed, Mistress 9-sama."

"Me too. Still, where and who is Leon going to sleep with?"

"Let's flip a coin. Heads, I go with Mistress 9-sama. Tails, I go with Black Lady-sama."

They nodded. You reached for a coin and flipped it. Which side did it landed on?
1233212111.title: Leon's Past: The Tragic Day

12332121111.content:
(WARNING: Masturbation and Blowjob ahead. Don't like? Skip the last part of the chapter and go the the next one or go to another option/storyline).

The coin flipped in the air for a little while. Soon enough, it began to fall. You catched it with your right hand and placed it on your left hand's back. You removed your hand to show the result and, to Black Lady's disapointment and to Mistress 9's joy, the result was "Heads".

"I won! Lucky me!"

"Oh, phooey!"

"Don't be a sore sport, Black Lady. I won fair and square."

"I know, I know.", she said with her head a bit low.

You put the coin back in your pocket. Then, you went to her and placed your left hand on her right shoulder.

"Hey. I'ts okay, Black Lady-sama. I'll go with Mistress 9-sama, tonight. But, tomorrow, I'll go with you. And from then, we will alternate. How does that sound?"

12332121111.title: Heads (Mistress 9's room) (reserved).

choices: Leon's village (reserved for me, GWriter or Venom/Anti-Venom).
123321211111.content:
(You thinking, Saphir. Also, remember that, when someone thinks, the sentence is located between thse symbols:**)

Morning had come. Even tough the room had no windows, you could tell. And that was because you usualy only woke up at morning. Unless something like a fight was going on or an explosion happened. You tried to stretch but failed. You turn around, trying to check your surroundings but, all you see and feel are two walls of soft, yet firm, flesh. Then, all that happened last night came back to you. Needless to say that you blushed quite heavily, due to your current situation. Still, you had to admitt, this place was very comfortable. It almost made you want to sleep again. But that wouldn't happen anytime soon, because you remembered that today was an important day. After all, you would go with Mistress 9 and Black Lady to your village's remains and get the necessary things to ensure, both, their victory and, ultimately, their freedom from the Wisemen's clutches. You wanted to do so because, while they did made you a pet, they treat you more like a companion. They were kind to you since the beggining and treated you with respect. You didn't knew why, but you felt attracted to them and cared for them and for their safety. You looked up, and saw Mistress 9, sleeping peacefully.

*Mistress 9-sama...*, you couldn't help but finding her cute, sleeping like this.*I promess you, that I'll find a way for you and Black Lady-sama to be free from the Wisemen. No matter what the cost may be.*

Still, that would take a long time. And you wanted so do something for them, now.

*Oh! I know!*

You then dislodged yourself as carefully as you could, so as to not to wake up Mistress 9. Then, you made your way to the door and passed through the opening at the bottom. Once outside of the room, you used some of your power to restore your normal size. Then, remembering yesterday's tour, you made your way to the base's kitchen. Once there, you gathered all the necessary ingredients and got to work.
--------------------------------------------
(Mistress 9's pov)

I opened my eyes to greet the new day. Or, at least, I think it's the next day. It's hard to know when your cheap boss dosen't bother to put windows on the walls. Anyway, I stretched and gave an, admittedly a bit unladylike, yawn. And, I couldn't tell why but, I felt that something was missing. Then I remembered.

"My pet!", I screamed, worried that something may have happened to him.

I reched for him in my cleavege but he wasn't there. Then, I got out of the bed and searched my hole room, despereate ti find him. I know, he was just my pet, so why worry so much, right? But, to me, and I'm sure that Black Lady felt the same way, he was special. No one ever showed us such loyalty and devotion before. Not to mention that he, for some reason, seemed to care for us. Once I had finished my search, I came to the conclusion the he had to be somewhere on the base, So, I used my powers to fix the mess I had made of my room, donned my usual dress and went to the door. Once in the hallway, I knocked on Black Lady's door, to see if she had taken him in the night. I herd some rutling, which indicated that Black Lady had, either, just recently woken up, or that I had woken her up. After some more rustling, the door opened and Black Lady came out.

"*Yawn* Good mornin, Mistress 9."

"Good morning. Say, have you seen Leon?"

"No. Why? Wasn't he with you? Don't tell me you already lost him?!"

"M-more or less. I don't know how it happened. I put him between my breast last night. Then, when I woke up this morning, he was gone!"

"Well, we have to find- Hey, do you smell something?"

"Yes. It smells good. Someone must be making breakfast."

"Anyway, Leon couldn't have gone far. Let's eat something and then we'll search, okay?"

"Alright."

Then, we made our way to the living room. On the way there, to our displeasure, we meet with Demande and his brother, Saphir.

"Good morning, Mistress 9, Black Lady."

"Good morning."

"Good morning."

The walk was a short and silent one. Soon, we were rounding the corner to the living room, when Demande had to open his big mouth.

"Say, where is that "pet" of yours? Heve you lost him? Or has he left you already?"

"That is not of your business, Demande.", I said, while giving him a glare that warned him to shut up.

"Oh? It seems someone rose with the left foot today."

"Nii-san, please. That is enough."

"Why? I'm just stating the obvious."

I was about to snap at him when, out of nowhere, a kunai came in our direction. More specifically, Demande's direction. It hitted the wall, thought it seemed that it was on purpouse. What surprised me, and, apparently the others as well, given their faces, was that the kunai was made of ice. Black Lady and I, however, knew what this meant. It meant that Leon was close by. After all, we had seen him made an ice statue last night. Our susppicions were confirmed when we hard his voice.

"It would be wise of you to watch, both, your tone and your words towards Mistress 9-sama and Black Lady-sama, Demande.", he said in a warning tone.

We turned the corner and saw Leon, wearing the clothing he had yesterday. As Black Lady and I had thought, the nice smell from before, was indeed coming from the kitchen. What was surprising, however, was that it was Leon who was cooking!

"I didn't knew you could cook, Leon."

"*chuckle* There are many things about me that you don't know, Black Lady-sama. Good morning to you all, by the way."

"Good morning, Leon."

I then walked to where he was.

"Good morning, Mistress 9-"

I hitted him in the head with a giant white fan.

"Ow! Hey! What was that for!"

"That was for maing us worry!"

"Mistress 9-sama..."

"The two of us were very worried about you, you know?"

"Sorry. It's just that, you were so good to me yesterday. And I wanted to compensate you. So I thought of making breakfast for you. Sorry for making you worry."

"It's alright. Just don't go off on your own again, okay?"

"I promess you I won't, okay?"

"Good."

"*ahem*"

We turned to see Demende and Saphir lookin oddly at us.

"What is it?"

"Nothing. So, you are the Leon I heard of, huh?"

"Yes. You must be Demende's younger brother, Saphir, right?"

"Indeed. Pleased to meet you."

"Same here."

Both shook hands with each other. And, Saphir smile at the time. It was odd, for Saphir rarely smiled.

"Well then. Let's get some breakfast, shell we?"

We all sat down and Leon brought us quite a heafty breakfast! There were four flavors of juice, apple, tangerin, orange and strawberry. He also brought pancackes with syrup, cheese breads, ham and cheese sandwiches and jam filled croisants!

"You... You made all of this?!"

"Yes. Please, do help yourselves."

"Don't mind if I do!", said Demande. But, when he was about to grab a croisant, Leon hitted his hand with a big wooden spoon!

"Ouch! Hey!"

"Where are your manner! Ladies first, then the gentlemen, like Saphir-san and myself. And lastly poor fools, like you."

"*chuckle*"

"*giggles*"

"*pff*"

"You little-!!!"

He didn't got to finish, because of the glares Black Lady and I were giving him. Heck, even Saphir and glaring at him. It seemed that he had taken a liking to Leon. The rest of the breakfast was uneventful. And goodness gracious, Leon's food was the best I had ever tasted! Seriously, his coocking could put many of the world's best chefs to shame!

"Well then, we should get going."

"Going where?"

"Today we are going to the ruins of Leon's village to collect the tools for the Sailor Scouts destruction."

"I see."

"Ha! Still going out about that?"

"You two are invited to come, if you want."

"Are you sure? You don't mind?"

"Not at all. However, I'll give you a warning, Demande. While my village lays in ruins, there are a few places, like the graveyard that are still intact. And if something happens or if you do anything to even one of those, be sure that you'll regrett it deeply. Is that clear?"

"*gulp* Y-yes."

"Good. Well then. Let's go."

So, we all stood up and went to the same room where we were last night.

"Now, each of you grab onto me and I'll telepor us there."

Demende and Saphir grabed Leon's shoulders. Black Lady grabbed Leon's right hand and I grabbed his left hand. Then, we simply vanished.
123321211111.title: The next morning (reserved).

1233212111111.content:
(Just a reminder: Leon(you), Mistress 9, Black Lady, Demande and Saphir).

---Seiryu Village---General POV---

You all arrived at the outskirts of your clan's village in a matter of seconds, thanks to your teleport. When you all appeared, you found yourselves in a hill that was once full of grass and bushes. Now, just like everything else in this place, it was burnt and devoid of any life.

"I simply can't believe it."

"What is it, Black Lady?"

"Well, when we saw Leon's memories, this place was beautiful and so full of life. I find it hard to believe that we're in the same place."

"I feel the same."

"I'm used to it."

"Oh? How so?"

"I usualy come here every year, on my birthday. Which, as Black Lady-sama and Mistress 9-sama know, is today."

That fact shocked Demende and Saphir a bit. And, while Demende didn't cared, Saphir felt sorry for you, even tough he didn't showed it. Mistress 9 and Black Lady placed their hands on your shoulders to comfort you a bit.

"Leon, we don't have to do this today if you don't want to."

"I appreciate it, Black Lady-sama. But, like I said before, I'm used to it. Besides, the sooner we do this, the sooner we can beggin to plan the Sailor Scouts downfall."

"Well, if you are sure..."

"I am. Let's go."

And so, you made your way to the village. Once you were at the entrance, the others could see the level of destruction that the fight from that day had caused. All that was once green was now ashes. Most houses had only parts of walls and floor left. And some didn't had even that. Then, you arrived at the center of the village, where the remains of the five fountains and of the once proud clan tree stood. It had been cut a little lower of the half. Right on the middle of the clan's mark.

"Leon. The way that this tree has been cut..."

"It was meant to pass a message from the demons. The message being that the Seiryu/Miyanoshita clan was no more."

You then kept walking until you all arrived at the clan's graveyard.

"Demande, Saphir-kun. Stay here. Black Lady-sama, Mistress 9-sama, you can come, if you want."

"Hey! Why do we have to stay?!"

"You, because I don't trust you at all. And I only invited you to prove that I was not lying and to be polite. But I guarantee that you are not welcome here, Demande. As for Saphir-kun, well, the issue is the same. I'm sorry Saphir-kun. I just don't have the same level of trust with you that I have with Black Lady-sama and Mistress 9-sama."

"It's oaky. I understand. I'm not bothered at all, Leon-kun.", he said, smiling.

"*sigh* I'm glad to hear that.", Leon replied, also with a smile.

"It seems you two are getting along quite well."

"Yes. I find that Leon is a pleasant company."

"I feel the same about you, Saphir-kun. Anyway, please come this way."

"Alright, Leon."

"Okay."

You then walked into the graveyard. During the walk, Black Lady and Mistress 9 felt more and more sorry for you with every passing moment. For they saw the amount of graves that were in there. What was more, was that the grave-stones seemed to have been sculpted by the hands of a child. And, being that only you were left on that day, they knew that they were made by you. You stoped walking once you arrived at a particular group of four graves. They read:

"Here lies: Rihito Seiryu, Satsuki Miyanoshita Seiryu, Luchia Seiryu and Yuki Seiryu May they rest in peace"

"Leon, are this...?"

You simply nodded. Then you crouched and raised your hands. You cuped them and they began to glow with a mix of red and light blue lights. Then you breathed into your hands and closed them. Once you opened them, you expaned the energy until it assumed the shape that you wanted. Black Lady and Mistress 9 were speechless. For the shape that had been revealed, was that of twenty flowers made of ice, with fire inside.

"Leon, that's amazing...!"

"Thanks."

You then placed 5 flowers in each grave. All of them glowing in harmony with each other. Once the flowers had been set, you raised, bowed, to honor them, and then the tree of you went backl to the graveyard's entrance. Once you had reunited with Demande and Saphir you continued your way until you arrived at what was left of the main house.

"This was your house, right, Leon-kun?"

"Yes. My family was the leader of the Seiryu clan."

You all went inside and you lead the group to the back of the house, where a wooden wall stood.

"It's good to see that this part remained intact."

"What remained intact? It's just a wooden wall!"

"Heh. Apparences can decive, Demande."

You placed your hand on the walll, then the spot where your hand was glowed white for a few seconds and the wall vanished, revealing a large and thick safe door. Needless to say everyone was surprised. You simply smirked. You then approached the door and input the security code necessary. You also undid the spells that protected it. Spells that could only be dipelled by a clan member. Then, the door opened to reveal a long staircase that went down.

"Well then, shall we get going?"

You all made your way to the end of the stairs. When you arrived on the ground, it was pitch black. You created a ball of fire and placed it on a nearby torch. That initiated a chain sequence that lit every torch on the place. And once all the torches were alight, everyone, except you, of course, was marveled at the sight. There were countless shelves, each containing hundreds and hundres of books!

"Leon, where are we?"

"We are on the treasure room, of course. I know what you are thinking. "Where's the gold, and all the jewerly, etc...", right? Well, there are those in another part of this room. But, to the Seiryu clan, two of the biggest and greatest treasures were knowledge and cuture."

"I see."

"Still, we can come for those later. Right now, we are looking for something else."

"What is it that we are loking for, Leon-kun?"

"You'll see."

You then took them to the end of the room. Wich, due to how large it was, it took half an hour ot reach it. There, at the oposite wall of the room, stood a huge block made of crystal. And inside of it, was an armor that could only belong to a warrior. It was made for a toned body, the pieces of the armor were almost all white, except for the pieces's borders, which were midnight black. On the back of the chest armor was the clan's mark, shining proudly. And, on the front of the helmet, was a crecent black moon that had a saphire-blue glow around it. Also, attached to the armorºs shoulders, was a cape that was midnight blue with white stars on the outside and red on the inside. Besides the armor, was a sword (which looked like this: http://maexam.deviantart.com/art/Persona...) inside of it's sheath (looks like this: http://maexam.deviantart.com/art/Persona...).

"This armor belonged to the male clan founder. nd this sword belonged to the female one. And they were passed from generation to generation. From father to son and from mother to daughter. They were given when the heir reached adulthood. Meaning, when they turned 18. Which is the case."

At that moment, the crystal broke and the armor and sword were released. Instantly, the armor's pieces separated and each were to their corresponing locations on your body. Once the armor was fully in place, the sword attached itself on the armors belt.

"So, how do I look?"

"Not bad."

"Wow. Just, wow!"

"You look so cool, Leon!"

"Indeed. It's a fine armor. And the sworde is quite something as well."

"Yeah. But don't let the appearence of this pieces fool you. This armor, as well as the sword were reforged many times before they were passed. Each time, some drops of blood of the new owner were used. Because of that, this armor and this sword answer only to me."

"I see. Because of the blood used, they recognize only you as their true master, right?"

"Exactly. Now then. This is only half of what we've come for. Come with me, if you will."

You then opened a portal that glowed white and steped through it, with everyone else right behind you.
1233212111111.title: The Seiryu Village

info.brief_description: You shrink around ANY female character from the Anime/Manga Sailor Moon.
info.description:
Okay. Here goes the rules:

CAN DO:

-Vore (soft oral vore, anal vore and unbirth);
-Insertion;
-Sex (F/F, M/F (the male being the main character), HERM/M, F/HERM, HERM/HERM);
-Orgies (up to four girls);
-Digestion of the main character (but he/she MUST reform after being digested);
-Full Tour (going from the mouth and out the anus alive, for those who don't know what Full Tour means);
and
-HAVE FUN!!!

Things allowed for the underage characters (Chibi Chibi, Chibiusa, Hotaru (I'm not sure if she's a child or a teen) and Nehelenia in one of her forms):

-Vore (oral soft vore, anal vore and unbirth);
-Insertion;
-Digestion of the main character (but he/she MUST reform after being digested);
and
-Full Tour (going from the mouth and out the anus alive, for those who don't know what Full Tour means);

CAN'T DO:

-Anything related with feet is FORBIDDEN! (except if you have to climb them to get the girl's attention, but that's ALL!!!);
-Farting;
-Scat;
-Watersports;
-Permanently kill the main character;

Side rules:

-If you are going to introduce a character, please try to put a picture of her (optional);
-Little to no male interaction. The male characters may have small apparitions, once in while, but thats all. (MUST follow);
-When you are going to write about sex, the main character can return to normal size, but he must shrink again after the sex (Must follow);
-The main character should be referred to as [Your name], however, he/she can be named.(Must follow)
-Keep the story in second person point of view (POV) (i.e. YOU started climbing her, or YOU went down her throat) (Must follow);
-Check the grammar, PLEASE!!! (MUST follow):
-If you are going to add to this story, make it so that the people are able to read and understand the chapter (no writing like this: "U R n00b!") (MUST follow);
info.pretty_title: Shrunk with the Sailor Moon characters
